Method Detail

integerExplode

public static array integerExplode(string $delimiter, string $string)

Explodes a $string delimited by $delimeter and passes each item in the array through intval().
Corresponds to explode(), but with conversion to integers for all values.

Parameters

$delimiter - Delimiter string to explode with
$string - The string to explode

trimExplode

public static array trimExplode(string $delimiter, string $string, boolean $onlyNonEmptyValues=FALSE)

Explodes a string and trims all values for whitespace in the ends.
If $onlyNonEmptyValues is set, then all blank ('') values are removed.

Parameters

$delimiter - Delimiter string to explode with
$string - The string to explode
$onlyNonEmptyValues - If set, all empty values (='') will NOT be set in output

arrayMergeRecursiveOverrule

public static array arrayMergeRecursiveOverrule(array $firstArray, array $secondArray, mixed $dontAddNewKeys=FALSE, mixed $emptyValuesOverride=TRUE)

Merges two arrays recursively and "binary safe" (integer keys are overridden as well), overruling similar values in the first array ($firstArray) with the values of the second array ($secondArray) In case of identical keys, ie. keeping the values of the second.

Parameters

$firstArray - array
$secondArray - array, overruling the first array
$dontAddNewKeys - set, keys that are NOT found in $firstArray (first array) will not be set. Thus only existing value can/will be overruled from second array.
$emptyValuesOverride - set (which is the default), values from $secondArray will overrule if they are empty (according to PHP's empty() function)

randomizeArrayOrder

public static array randomizeArrayOrder(array $array)

Randomizes the order of array values. The array should not be an associative array as the key-value relations will be lost.

Parameters

$array - Array to reorder

containsMultipleTypes

public static boolean containsMultipleTypes(array $array)

Returns TRUE if the given array contains elements of varying types

Parameters

$array -

array_reduce

public static mixed array_reduce(array $array, string $function, mixed $initial=NULL)

Replacement for array_reduce that allows any type for $initial (instead of only integer)

Parameters

$array - the array to reduce
$function - the reduce function with the same order of parameters as in the native array_reduce (i.e. accumulator first, then current array element)
$initial - the initial accumulator value

getValueByPath

public static mixed getValueByPath(array $array, array $path)

Returns the value of a nested array by following the specifed path.

Parameters

$array - The array to traverse
$path - The path to follow, ie. a simple array of keys

sortKeysRecursively

public static boolean sortKeysRecursively(array $array, integer $sortFlags=NULL)

Sorts multidimensional arrays by recursively calling ksort on its elements.

Parameters

$sortFlags - the array to sort
